code: import React from'react';import{Button,AutoRenewIcon,Skeleton}from'@pancakeswap/uikit';import{useTranslation}from'contexts/Localization';import{useVaultApprove}from'../../../hooks/useApprove';import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const VaultApprovalAction=_ref=>{let{isLoading=false,setLastUpdated}=_ref;const{t}=useTranslation();const{handleApprove,requestedApproval}=useVaultApprove(setLastUpdated);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:isLoading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Skeleton,{width:"100%",height:"52px"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{isLoading:requestedApproval,endIcon:requestedApproval?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AutoRenewIcon,{spin:true,color:"currentColor"}):null,disabled:requestedApproval,onClick:handleApprove,width:"100%",children:t('Enable')})});};export default VaultApprovalAction;
